import React, { useState } from "react" import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom" export default function Edit(){ const [formdata,setformdata]=useState({'email':'','mobile':'','username':''}) const location=useLocation() const {state}=location setformdata({...formdata,username:state.username.S,email:state.email.S,age:state.age.N}) return( <>

update page

setformdata({...formdata,username:e.target.value})} className="form-control"/>
setformdata({...formdata,email:e.target.value})} type="email"/>
setformdata({...formdata,age:e.target.value})} type="number" className="form-control"/>
) }
